name: database-management
description: Comprehensive database management tools for PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, and more

commands.install: apt update && apt install -y postgresql postgresql-contrib

mysql.description: Popular open-source relational database management system

commands.install: apt update && apt install -y mysql-server mysql-client
apt update && apt install -y mariadb-server mariadb-client

mongodb.description: NoSQL document database for modern applications

commands.install: curl -fsSL https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-7.0.asc | gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/mongodb-server-7.0.gpg && echo 'deb [ arch=amd64,arm64 signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/mongodb-server-7.0.gpg ] https://repo.mongodb.org/apt/ubuntu jammy/mongodb-org/7.0 multiverse' | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb-org-7.0.list && apt update && apt install -y mongodb-org

redis.description: In-memory data structure store, used as database, cache, and message broker

commands.install: apt update && apt install -y sqlite3 libsqlite3-dev

cassandra.description: Distributed NoSQL database for handling large amounts of data

commands.install: curl -fsSL https://www.apache.org/dist/cassandra/KEYS | gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/cassandra-archive-keyring.gpg && echo 'deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/cassandra-archive-keyring.gpg] https://downloads.apache.org/cassandra/debian/40x main' | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/cassandra.list && apt update && apt install -y cassandra

curl -fsSL https://artifacts.elastic.co/GPG-KEY-elasticsearch | gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/elasticsearch-keyring.gpg && echo 'deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/elasticsearch-keyring.gpg] https://artifacts.elastic.co/packages/8.x/apt stable main' | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/elastic-8.x.list && apt update && apt install -y elasticsearch

influxdb.description: Time series database for monitoring and analytics

commands.install: curl -fsSL https://repos.influxdata.com/influxdb.key | gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/influxdb-archive-keyring.gpg && echo 'deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/influxdb-archive-keyring.gpg] https://repos.influxdata.com/debian stable main' | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/influxdb.list && apt update && apt install -y influxdb2

curl -fsSL https://debian.neo4j.com/neotechnology.gpg.key | gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/neo4j.gpg && echo 'deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/neo4j.gpg] https://debian.neo4j.com stable 5' | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/neo4j.list && apt update && apt install -y neo4j

curl -fsSL https://couchdb.apache.org/repo/keys.asc | gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/couchdb-archive-keyring.gpg && echo 'deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/couchdb-archive-keyring.gpg] https://apache.jfrog.io/artifactory/couchdb-deb/ jammy main' | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/couchdb.list && apt update && apt install -y couchdb

database-tools.description: Essential tools for database administration and management

commands.install: apt update && apt install -y pgadmin4 mysql-workbench dbeaver-ce phpmyadmin adminer

database-backup.description: Tools for database backup and recovery

commands.install: apt update && apt install -y pg_dump mysqldump mongodump redis-cli
commands.check: which pg_dump && which mysqldump && which mongodump
